org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc

Class BufferChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.BufferChain

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
class BufferChain
extends Object
    Chain of ByteBuffers. Used writing out an array of byte buffers. Writes in chunks.

    • Field Summary

      private int bufferOffset 
      private ByteBuffer[] buffers

      private int size

    • Method Detail

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes()
        Expensive. Makes a new buffer to hold a copy of what is in contained ByteBuffers. This call drains this instance; it cannot be used subsequent to the call.
        Returns:
        A new byte buffer with the content of all contained ByteBuffers.

      • hasRemaining

        boolean hasRemaining()

      • write

        long write(GatheringByteChannel channel,
           int chunkSize)
    throws IOException
        Write out our chain of buffers in chunks
        Parameters:
        channel - Where to write
        chunkSize - Size of chunks to write.
        Returns:
        Amount written.
        Throws:
        IOException

        int size()
